title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 174 - Computation Of Tuition Charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 174 - Computation Of Tuition Charges

State Regulations
§ 174.1 - Definitions
§ 174.2 - Computation of tuition charges for nonresident pupils
§ 174.3 - Computation of tuition charges for pupils who have received a high school diploma
§ 174.4 - Designation of school districts to receive nonresident students pursuant to education law, sections 2040 and 2045(1)
§ 174.5 - Computation of the direct cost of educational services provided to homeless children pursuant to section 3202(8) of the education law and section 100.2(x) of this title

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 174

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207, 2040, 2041, 2042, 2045[1], 3202, 3602, 3602-c, 4403[3]; L. 1986, chs. 53, 273, 886; L. 1988, ch. 348

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
